tuv.seg: Learner driving permits for motorcycles
Ceadúnais tiomána foghlaimeora le haghaidh gluaisrothar

It is a statutory requirement that you must hold at least a learner driving permit (previously known as a provisional licence) for the appropriate category of motorcycle if you want to drive a motorcycle in a public place. You are required to carry your permit with you at all times when driving

Is ceanglas reachtúil atá ann nach mór duit ar a laghad ceadúnas tiomána foghlaimeora (ar a dtugtaí ceadúnas sealadach roimhe seo) a bheith agat don chatagóir chuí feithicle más mian leat gluaisrothar a thiomáint in áit phoiblí
This document explains how to apply for or renew a learner permit for a motorcycle
Ní mor duit do cheadúnas a bheith leat an t-am ar fad nuair atá tú ag tiomáint
To apply for a learner permit, you must be normally resident in Ireland
Ní mór duit gnáthchónaí a bheith ort in Éirinn chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar cheadúnas foghlaimeora
If you usually live here for at least 185 days in each calendar year (because of personal and occupational ties), you are considered to be normally resident in Ireland
Meastar go bhfuil gnáthchónaí in Éirinn ort má bhíonn cónaí ort anseo go hiondúil ar feadh ar a laghad 185 lá i ngach bliain féilire (mar gheall ar cheangal pearsanta agus ceirde)
The Road Safety Authority now has responsibility for driver licensing and has set up a new National Driver Licence Service (NDLS)
Ó 19 Eanáir, 2013, tá an tÚdarás um Shábháilteacht ar Bhóithre freagrach as ceadúnú tiománaithe
In addition, the application process has changed and, when applying for a learner permit, you have to visit one of the new NDLS centres
Mar chuid den phróiseas iarratais duine-le-duine, beidh do grianghraf agus do shíniú go digiteach a ghabháil
As part of the face-to-face application process, your photo and your signature is captured digitally
Cuirfear iad seo san áireamh sa táille atá ann cheana féin. Beidh ort an doiciméadú breise chun do chéannacht a dhearbhú
You have to bring additional documentation to confirm your identity
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil ar an láithreán gréasáin NDLS
A new plastic-card learner permit has been introduced, replacing the paper learner permit
Faigheann aon duine a dhéanann iarratas ar cheadúnas nó cead foghlaimeora ó 12 Eanáir, 2013 ar an leagan nua
This is an EU initiative to introduce a secure, compact style of licence in all member states
Is tionscnamh AE a thabhairt isteach slán, stíl dlúth ceadúnais i ngach ballstát
The number of driving licence categories has increased and the minimum age requirement for certain categories has changed also
Chomh maith leis sin, méadú ar líon na tiomána chatagóirí ceadúnais agus an riachtanas aois íosta le haghaidh catagóirí áirithe a athrú
Further information is available on the Road Safety Authority's website
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil ar shuíomh gréasáin an Údaráis um Shábháilteacht ar Bhóithre
Before you learn to drive on public roads, you must hold a learner permit, covering the category of motorcycle you wish to drive
Sula dtosaíonn tú ag foghlaim tiomána ar bhóithre poiblí, ní mór duit ceadúnas foghlaimeora a bheith agat a chuimsíonn an chatagóir ghluaisrothair is mian leat a thiomáint
A learner permit to drive a motorcycle is usually valid for 2 years
Is gnách go mbíonn ceadúnas foghlaimeora chun gluaisrothar a thiomáint bailí ar feadh 2 bhliain
Learner permit holders are not allowed carry pillion passengers (passengers on the back of their motorcycle) or drive on a motorway
Ní cheadaítear do shealbhóirí ceadúnas foghlaimeora paisinéirí cúlóige (paisinéirí ar chúl a ngluaisrothair) a iompar nó tiomáint ar mhótarbhealach
Motorcyclists with learner permits are required to display L-plates on a yellow fluorescent high visibility tabard
Ceanglaítear ar ghluaisrothaithe ag a bhfuil ceadúnas foghlaimeora L-phlátaí a thaispeáint ar chásóg bhuí fhluaraiseach ard-infheictheachta
(A tabard is a bib or sleeveless outer garment with open side-seams)
(Is éard is casóg ann prioslóir nó ball seachtrach éadaigh gan mhuinchillí ag a bhfuil séamaí oscailte ar a taobhanna)
The letter 'L' must be in red and at least 15cm in height on a white background, and must be to the front and rear of your torso
Ní mór go mbíonn an litir ‘L’ le sonrú le dath na deirge agus a bheith ar a laghad 15cm ar airde ar chúlra bán, agus a bheith chun tosaigh agus ar chúl do cholainne
It is a criminal offence for learner motorcyclists not to display L plates
Is cion choiriúil é mura dtaispeánann gluaisrothaí foghlaimeora na L-phlátaí

Since October 2011 the drink driving limit for drivers with learner permits and those in their first two years on a full driving licence is reduced to 20mg/100m of blood. The penalty points disqualification threshold of 12 points is reduced to 7 penalty points for those who obtain their first learner permit on or after 1 August 2014

Ó Dheireadh Fómhair 2011 i leith, tá laghdú tagtha ar an teorainn um thiomáint ar meisce do thiománaithe ag a bhfuil ceadúnais foghlaimeora agus iad siúd ag a bhfuil ceadúnais iomlána tiomána acu don chéad dá bhliain, chuig 20mg/100ml fola

It remains at the lower threshold while they drive under a learner permit and subsequently during the first two years while they drive under their first driving licence. Further information is available on the Road Safety Authority website
Tá fáil ar fhaisnéis ar na bearta a bheartaítear chun tiománaithe foghlaimeora agus neamhchleachtacha a chosaint ar láithreán gréasáin an Údaráis um Shábháilteacht ar Bhóithre
The rules of the road are available at rulesoftheroad.ie
Is féidir leat rialacha an bhóthair a léamh ag rotr.ie
Since 19 January 2013 there are 4 categories of motorcycle in Ireland that are licensed for use on public roads
Ó 19 Eanáir 2013 is ann do 4 chatagóir ghluaisrothar in Éirinn atá ceadúnaithe lena n-úsáid ar bhóithre poiblí
There are also specified minimum ages for motorcyclists
Anuas air sin, is ann d'aoiseanna sonraithe íosta do ghluaisrothaithe

Roimh 19 Eanáir, 2013, bhí an méid seo a leanas na catagóirí gluaisrothar agus móipéidí chomh maith leis an aois íosta le haghaidh tiomáint:

* Category A learner permits issued before 19 January 2013 carry a restriction
* Cuirtear srian ar cheadúnais foghlaimeora chatagóir A eisiúint roimh an 19 Eanáir, 2013
This restriction limits the licence holder to motorcycles (with or without a sidecar) subject to a power limit of 25kW
Cuireann an srian teorainn ar an sealbhóir ceadúnais gan ach gluaisrothair (le nó gan carr cliathánach) faoi réir teorainn chumhachta 25kW a thiomáint
This restriction continues for 2 years after you have obtained a full driving licence for this category providing the licence was obtained before 19 January 2013
Leanann an srian seo ar feadh 2 bhliain tar éis go mbíonn ceadúnas iomlán tiomána faighte agat don chatagóir seo más rud é go bhfuarthas an ceadúnas roimh 19 Eanáir, 2013
Getting a full driving licence
Ceadúnas iomlán a fháil
If you are old enough, the usual steps you must take to get a full driving licence in a particular category is to:
Má tá an aois cheart bainte amach agat, is iad na gnáthchéimeanna nach mór duit glacadh chun ceadúnas iomlán tiomána a fháil i gcatagóir ar leith:
Pass the motorcycle/moped theory test
Pas a fháil sa tástáil teoirice gluaisrothair/móipéide
Get a learner permit for the category you wish to get a full licence for
Cead foghlaimeora a fháil don chatagóir ar mian leat ceadúnas iomlán a fháil di
Complete all the appropriate Initial Basic Training (IBT) modules on the appropriate type of motorcycle
Na modúil Bhunoiliúna (IBT) ábhartha go léir ar an saghas cuí gluaisrothair a chríochnú
Pass the motorcycle driving test after a minimum of 6 months on the appropriate representative motorcycle
Pas a fháil sa tástáil tiomána gluaisrothair tar éis ar a laghad 6 mhí a chaitheamh ar an ngluaisrothar ábhartha ionadaíoch

However, if you have already held a category A1 or A2 full driving licence for at least two years it is possible to get a full licence for category A2 or A respectively through what is called progressive access, without going through all those steps

Má bhí ceadúnas iomlán chatagóir A1 nó A2 i do sheilbh agat cheana féin ar feadh ar a laghad dhá bhliain, is féidir ceadúnas iomlán a fháil do chatagóir A2 nó A, faoi seach, trí rud ar a dtugtar rochtain fhorásach, gan na céimeanna go léir sin a ghlacadh
Providing you have already completed IBT training for your existing licence, the steps you follow are:
A fhad agus a chríochnaigh tú oiliúint IBT do do cheadúnas reatha, is iad na céimeanna a ghlacann tú:
Get a learner permit for the category you wish to get a full licence for
Cead foghlaimeora a fháil don chatagóir ar mian leat ceadúnas iomlán a fháil di
Complete the IBT progression module on the appropriate type of motorcycle
An modúl IBT um dhul chun cinn a chríochnú ar an saghas cuí gluaisrothair
You may also have to do a motorcycle driving test if you did not pass the test for your existing licence
B’fhéidir go mbeidh ort tástáil tiomána gluaisrothair a dhéanamh murar éirigh leat pas a fháil sa tástáil do do cheadúnas reatha tiomána
It is possible to get a category A learner permit at age 20 under progressive access
Is féidir cead foghlaimeora chatagóir A a fháil ag aois 20 faoi rochtain fhorásach
Information on the process for obtaining a motorcycle licence (pdf) and a related motorcycle FAQ (pdf) is available on the Road Safety Authority's website

Féadfaidh tú teacht ar fhaisnéis ar an bpróiseas nua chun ceadúnas gluaisrothair a fháil (pdf) agus ar na ceisteanna coitianta comhghaolmhara FAQ (pdf) ar láithreán gréasáin an Údaráis um Shábháilteacht ar Bhóithre
Your first learner permit
Do chéad cheadúnas foghlaimeora
You must have a valid driver theory test certificate for motoycycle and moped categories before a first motorcycle learner permit will be granted
Ní mór duit deimhniú tástáil teoirice tiomána a fháil do chatagóirí gluaisrothair agus móipéide sula ndeonófar do chéad chead foghlaimeora gluaisrothair duit
The theory test certificate is valid for 2 years from the date of issue
Tá an deimhniú tástáil teoirice bailí ar feadh 2 bhliain ó dháta na heisiúna
If your learner permit expired at least 5 years ago, then you must pass the theory test again before a learner permit will be issued
Má d’éag do cheadúnas nó do chead foghlaimeora ar a laghad 5 bliana ó shin, ní mór duit pas a fháil sa tástáil teoirice arís sula n-eiseofar cead foghlaimeora
You must do Initial Basic Training (IBT) when you get your first learner permit
Ní mór duit tabhairt faoi do Bhunoiliúint Tosaigh (IBT) nuair a fhaigheann tú do chéad chead foghlaimeora
You cannot ride a motorcycle on the road unsupervised by your IBT instructor unless have done your IBT and received a certificate of satisfactory completion
Ní féidir leat gluaisrothar a thiomáint ar an mbóthar gan bheith faoi mhaoirsiú do theagascóra IBT mura ndearna tú do IBT agus deimhniú um chríochnú sásúil a bhaint amach
You cannot take a driving test for at least 6 months after getting your first learner permit
Ní féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar an tríú cheadúnas nó ar aon cheann ina dhiaidh sin murar féidir leat a chruthú:
Your third learner permit
Moltar duit é sin a dhéanamh, áfach
You may not apply for a third or subsequent learner permit unless you can provide:
Féach 'Cá háit a ndéanfaidh mé iarratas' thíos
• Evidence that you have undergone a driving test for a motorbike in the 2-year period prior to your application (a 2-year learner permit will be granted) or
Má tá ceadúnas foghlaimeora do chatagóir A1 agat cheana féin, is féidir leat catagóir M a chur leis gan teastas tástála teoirice a chur ar aghaidh
• Evidence of a forthcoming test date (a 1-year learner permit will be granted)
Conas a ionadaím ceadúnas foghlaimeora a cailleadh nó a goideadh?
Learner permits are valid for 2 years (or in certain circumstances for 1 year only) and since 1 January 2013 the fee is €35
Tá ceadúnais foghlaimeora do ghluaisrothair bailí ar feadh 2 bhliain (nó 1 bhliain faoi chúinsí áirithe) agus ó 1 Eanáir 2013 is é an táille €35
They are free of charge to those aged 70 or over
Tá siad saor in aisce dóibh siúd atá 70 bliain d’aois nó níos sine
Information on acceptable forms of payment is available on the application form
Tá sé saor in aisce ceadúnas foghlaimeora a mhalartú chun ainm nó seoladh nua a thaispeáint
Any required eyesight tests or medical examinations are not free of charge
Tá eolas maidir le cineálacha inghlactha íocaíochta ar an bhfoirm iarratais
You have to apply in person to one of the NDLS centres
Má tá iarratas á dhéanamh agat ar cheadúnas foghlaimeora chun gluaisrothar a thiomáint, ba chóir duit iarrtas a dhéanamh ar cheadúnas do chatagóir A nó A2 nó A1 nó AM
You do not have to provide photographs with your application but you do need to bring additional documents with you in order to confirm you are the person who is applying for the driving licence
Tá an fhoirm iarratais ar chead foghlaimeora, Foirm D201, ar fáil ó ionaid NDLS, ionaid Tástála Tiomána, Tástáil Teoirice Tiomána agus ionaid Stáisiúin na nGardaí
If you have a learner permit or Irish driving licence, you need to bring evidence of your PPS Number and proof of address
Beidh ort iarratas a dhéanamh go pearsanta go dtí ceann de na hionaid NDLS
If you do not have a learner permit or an Irish driving licence, you need to bring photographic ID, proof of your residency entitlement, evidence of your PPS Number and proof of address
Má tá tú faoi láthair ar tiomána ceadúnas / cead foghlaimeora Éireannach, is gá duit a thabhairt leat an gceadúnas / cead agus fianaise d'Uimhir PSP
See ‘Proof of identity’ below
Féach 'Cruthúnas céannachta' alt thíos
You apply for or renew a learner permit using the learning permit application form (D201) which is available from NDLS centres, driving test centres, driving theory test centres and Garda stations
Ba cheart go ngabhfaidh an méid a leanas le foirm chomhlánaithe iarratais D201:
You can also download the learner permit application form (pdf) as well as guidance notes (pdf)
• Teastas breithe nó pas nó teastas cláraithe Níl sé seo ina riachtanas má:
Applying for your first learner permit
- tá ceadúnas reatha foghlaimeora i do sheilbh agat nó má bhí ceann agat am éigin le 5 bliana anuas nó
The completed application form D201 should be accompanied by:
- tá agat cheana féin ceadúnas bailí tiomána a d’eisigh stát eile AE nó stát nó tír aitheanta eile AE
• Your current or last driving licence and/or learner permit if you have one
• Do cheadúnas reatha nó deireanach tiomána agus/nó do cheadúnas foghlaimeora má tá ceann agat
• Your driver theory test certificate
• Do theastas tástála teoirice tiomána
• A Driving Licence Eyesight Report Form
• Tuairisc ar radharc na súl, Foirm D502
A completed eyesight report form must accompany all first learner permit applications - see below
Ní mór go ngabhfaidh tuairisc chomhlánaithe ar radharc na súl le gach iarratas céaduaire ar cheadúnas foghlaimeora – féach thíos
• A Driving Licence Medical Report Form may be required - see below
• Tuairisc liachta, Foirm D501. Teastaíonn tuairisc liachta faoi chúinsí áirithe – féach thíos
• The appropriate fee - see Rates above
• An táille chuí – féach Rátaí thuas
Applying for your second learner permit
Iarratas a dhéanamh ar do dhara ceadúnas foghlaimeora
When applying for your second learner permit the completed application form D.201 should be accompanied by:
Nuair a bhíonn iarratas á dhéanamh agat ar do dhara cheadúnas foghlaimeora, ba cheart go ngabhfaidh an méid a leanas le foirm chomhlánaithe iarratais D201:
• Your last learner permit
• Do cheadúnas foghlaimeora deireanach
• A Driving Licence Medical Report Form may be required - see below
• Tuairisc liachta, Foirm D501
• A Driving Licence Eyesight Report Form may be required - see below
Teastaíonn tuairisc liachta faoi chúinsí áirithe – féach thíos
• The appropriate fee- see Rates above
• An táille chuí – féach Rátaí thuas
Applying for your third or subsequent learner permit
Iarratas a dhéanamh ar do thríú ceadúnas foghlaimeora nó cinn ina dhiaidh sin
When applying for your third or subsequent learner permit the completed application form D.201 should be accompanied by:
Ba cheart go ngabhfaidh an méid a leanas le foirm chomhlánaithe iarratais D201:
• Your last learner permit
• Do cheadúnas foghlaimeora deireanach
• Evidence of having taken the motorbike driving test in the previous 2 years or evidence of a forthcoming test
• Fianaise gur thug tú faoin tástáil tiomána gluaisrothair sa 2 bhliain roimhe sin nó fianaise de thástáil a bheidh ag teacht aníos
• A Driving Licence Medical Report Form may be required - see below
• Tuairisc liachta, Foirm D501
• A Driving Licence Eyesight Report Form may be required - see below
Teastaíonn tuairisc liachta faoi chúinsí áirithe – féach thíos
• The appropriate fee - see Rates above
• An táille chuí – féach Rátaí thuas
A completed Driving Licence Eyesight Report Form must accompany all first learner permit applications
Ní mór go ngabhfaidh tuairisc chomhlánaithe ar radharc na súl, Foirm D502, le gach iarratas céaduaire foghlaimeora – féach thíos
An eyesight report is not required where a medical report is provided unless indicated by the doctor
Ba chóir go dtabharfaidh radharceolaí oftalmach nó cleachtóir cláraithe liachta faoi do thástáil súl
It is also available from NDLS centres. A registered ophthalmic optician or a registered medical practitioner should conduct your eye test
Ba chóir dó nó di ansin Foirm D502 a chomhlánú agus bheith ina f(h)inné ar do dhearbhú sínithe ar an bhfoirm
The report is valid for 1 month
Tá an tuairisc bailí ar feadh 1 mhí
A Driving Licence Medical Report Form is required if:
Teastaíonn tuairisc liachta, Foirm D501, má:
• You will be 70 years of age or more on the first day of the period for which the permit is being issued
• Bheidh tú 70 bliain d’aois nó níos sine ar an gcéad lá den tréimhse a bhfuil an ceadúnas á eisiúint di, nó
• You have any of certain disabilities or conditions (see application form)
• Tá tú faoi mhíchumas áirithe nó tá galair áirithe ort nó
You do not have to provide a medical report if you have previously provided a satisfactory medical report which is still applicable
• Glacann tú drugaí nó cógas go rialta ar dócha go mbainfidh siad de do chumas chun tiomáint go sábháilte
It is also available from NDLS centres. A registered medical practitioner should carry out your medical examination and then complete the form
Ba cheart do chleachtóir cláraithe liachta tabhairt faoi do scrúdú liachta agus an fhoirm a chomhlánú ansin
You must sign the declaration on the medical report form in the presence of the registered medical practitioner
Ní mór duit an dearbhú a shíniú ar fhoirm na tuairisce liachta i láthair an chleachtóra chláraithe liachta
The report is valid for 1 month
Tá an tuairisc bailí ar feadh 1 mhí
